title: BCN pels Drets human
content:
This is a very interesting font I came across and I have been struggling for hours now to find out what it is. Its part of the logo for the BCN pels Drets human, the Barcelona human rights council, a government organization. Does anyone know who designed this font or identity? It reminds me of Klavika, but of course it is not. Thanks very much.

Font: 

 BetaSemi 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091032/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")

| [Screen Shot 2014-07-14 at 10.04.56 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091032/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-07-14%20at%2010.04.56%20PM.png) | 77.3 KB |
author: ChristianBu

comments.content: Similar to Galette by Paragraph, but not quite. I'll keep looking.
BetaSemi it is. Thanks very much Akira and kthomps.
